data.comment: The whistle has gone to start the match.
Strasbourg awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 3, Strasbourg are coming forward and Ludovic Ajorque gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Ruddy Buquet awards Lyon a goal kick.
Free kick for Strasbourg in their own half.
In the minute 6, Strasbourg's Mohamed Simakan misses with an attempt on goal.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Strasbourg.
Ruddy Buquet signals a Strasbourg throw-in in Lyon's half.
In the minute 7, Lyon awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in for Strasbourg close to the penalty box.
Strasbourg's Dimitri Lienard breaks free at Stade de la Meinau. But the strike goes wide of the post.
In the minute 8, Goal kick for Lyon at Stade de la Meinau.
In Strasbourg a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Jason Denayer (Lyon) wins the ball in the air but heads wide.
In the minute 9, Ball goes out of play for a Strasbourg goal kick.
Memphis Depay for Lyon is whistled offside.
In Strasbourg Lyon drive forward through Memphis Depay. His shot is on target but it's saved.
In the minute 11, Free kick Lyon.
Goal! Tino Kadewere gives Lyon a 0-1 lead in Strasbourg.
Great play from Memphis Depay to set up the goal.
In the minute 14, Ruddy Buquet signals a free kick to Lyon.
Free kick for Strasbourg in the half of Lyon.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 16, Lyon's Lucas Paqueta has run offside.
In Strasbourg a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Strasbourg needs to be cautious. Lyon have an attacking throw-in.
In the minute 19, Throw-in for Lyon at Stade de la Meinau.
Strasbourg to take a throw-in in Lyon territory.
Throw-in for Strasbourg in the half of Lyon.
In the minute 20, Free kick for Strasbourg in the half of Lyon.
Lyon's Tino Kadewere has been booked in Strasbourg.
The match at Stade de la Meinau has been interrupted briefly for a check on Adrien Thomasson, who is down injured.
In the minute 24, Throw-in Lyon.
Adrien Thomasson for Strasbourg is back on the field again.
Great finish from Karl Toko Ekambi to give Lyon a 0-2 lead.
In the minute 25, Memphis Depay with an assist there.
Ruddy Buquet signals a free kick to Strasbourg in their own half.
Strasbourg have a goal kick.
In the minute 30, Lyon's Houssem Aouar gets in a shot on goal at Stade de la Meinau. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Ruddy Buquet awards the away team a throw-in.
Throw-in for Lyon in their own half.
In the minute 32, Strasbourg pushes forward through Jean-Eudes Aholou, whose finish on goal is saved.
Strasbourg have been awarded a corner by Ruddy Buquet.
Ball safe as Lyon is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 33, Ruddy Buquet awards the away team a throw-in.
Can Strasbourg get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Lyon's half?
Ruddy Buquet signals a free kick to Lyon in their own half.
In the minute 36, Can Strasbourg capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Lyon's half?
Throw-in for Strasbourg in their own half.
Thierry Laurey (Strasbourg) is making a first substitution, with Habib Diallo replacing Lionel Carole.
In the minute 39, Corner awarded to Strasbourg.
Strasbourg push upfield and Dimitri Lienard gets his head to the ball. The attempt is cleared by an alert Lyon defence.
Strasbourg's Ludovic Ajorque gets his shot away but it misses the target.
In the minute 40, Ruddy Buquet awards Lyon a goal kick.
Ball safe as Lyon is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Lyon awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 41, Throw-in Lyon.
It's now 0-3 in Strasbourg as Karl Toko Ekambi scores for Lyon.
That's a fine assist from Memphis Depay.
In the minute 43, Goal! Strasbourg reduce the deficit to 1-3 through Habib Diallo.
Lyon will need to be alert as they defend a dangerous free kick from Strasbourg.
Dimitri Lienard for Strasbourg drives towards goal at Stade de la Meinau. But the finish is unsuccessful.
In the minute 45, 2 minutes of injury time will be added to the 1st half.
Ruddy Buquet signals a free kick to Strasbourg.
In the minute 45, The first-half has ended.
Maxwel Cornet (Lyon) gets a yellow card.
The second half has started at Stade de la Meinau.
Throw-in for Lyon in the half of Strasbourg.
In the minute 47, Strasbourg to take a throw-in in Lyon territory.
Lyon have a goal kick.
Jeanricner Bellegarde of Strasbourg gets in a strike, but is off target.
In the minute 50, Ball goes out of play for a Lyon goal kick.
Can Lyon capitalize from this dangerous free kick?
Mohamed Simakan is writhing in pain and play has been suspended for a few moments.
In the minute 52, Strasbourg awarded a free kick in their own half.
In Strasbourg, Strasbourg push forward quickly but are pulled up for offside.
At Stade de la Meinau, Karl Toko Ekambi has been yellow-carded for the away team.
In the minute 54, Free kick for Lyon in their own half.
Throw-in for Strasbourg at Stade de la Meinau.
Mohamed Simakan is back on his feet again.
In the minute 55, Strasbourg push forward at Stade de la Meinau and Ludovic Ajorque gets in a great header. The attempt is cleared by the Lyon defence.
Goal! The home team reduce the deficit to 2-3 through a strike by Jean-Eudes Aholou. .
Mohamed Simakan instrumental with a fine assist.
In the minute 57, Free kick Lyon.
Ludovic Ajorque (Strasbourg) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
Throw-in for Lyon at Stade de la Meinau.
In the minute 59, Free kick Lyon.
Lyon are pushing forward but Lucas Paqueta's finish is wide of the goal.
Goal kick for Strasbourg at Stade de la Meinau.
In the minute 62, Lyon drives forward and Memphis Depay gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Throw-in high up the field for Strasbourg in Strasbourg.
Ruddy Buquet signals a Strasbourg throw-in in Lyon's half.
In the minute 64, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Ball safe as Strasbourg is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Lyon make their first substitution with Moussa Dembele replacing Tino Kadewere.
In the minute 66, Ruddy Buquet awards the home team a throw-in.
Corner awarded to Strasbourg.
Lyon are coming forward and Memphis Depay gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
In the minute 67, It's a goal kick for the home team in Strasbourg.
Can Strasbourg get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Lyon's half?
Strasbourg advance rapidly upfield but Ruddy Buquet blows for offside.
In the minute 70, Strasbourg have been awarded a corner by Ruddy Buquet.
Lamine Kone (Strasbourg) gets up for a header but cannot keep the ball on target.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Strasbourg.
In the minute 71, Throw-in for Strasbourg in their own half.
Can Strasbourg get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Lyon's half?
Play has been temporarily suspended for attention to Houssem Aouar for Lyon who is writhing in pain on the pitch.
In the minute 72, Rudi Garcia (Lyon) is making a second change, with Jean Lucas replacing the possibly injured Houssem Aouar.
Mattia De Sciglio is replacing Leo Dubois for the away team.
Important block from the Strasbourg defence as Moussa Dembele fires in a strike for Lyon.
In the minute 74, Corner awarded to Lyon.
The home team have replaced Jeanricner Bellegarde with Ibrahima Sissoko. This is the second substitution made today by Thierry Laurey.
Throw-in Strasbourg.
In the minute 77, Ruddy Buquet signals a free kick to Strasbourg.
Free kick for Strasbourg in the half of Lyon.
Ruddy Buquet signals a free kick to Lyon in their own half.
In the minute 78, Lyon to take a throw-in in Strasbourg territory.
Free kick for Strasbourg in their own half.
Lyon have been awarded a corner by Ruddy Buquet.
In the minute 79, Karl Toko Ekambi (Lyon) wins the ball in the air but heads wide.
Ball goes out of play for a Strasbourg goal kick.
Lyon awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 80, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Strasbourg's Dimitri Lienard is on target but unsuccessful.
Ruddy Buquet awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 81, Strasbourg's Jean-Eudes Aholou misses with an attempt on goal.
Goal kick for Lyon at Stade de la Meinau.
Moussa Dembele (Lyon) gets in a header on goal but the attempt is cleared.
In the minute 84, Kenny Lala of Strasbourg gets in a strike, but is off target.
Ruddy Buquet awards Lyon a goal kick.
Majeed Waris is replacing Adrien Thomasson for Strasbourg at Stade de la Meinau.
In the minute 85, Strasbourg have a goal kick.
Throw-in for Strasbourg in the half of Lyon.
Rudi Garcia is making the team's fourth substitution at Stade de la Meinau with Sinaly Diomande replacing Lucas Paqueta.
In the minute 87, Lyon awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Strasbourg awarded a free kick in their own half.
In Strasbourg a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 89, Ruddy Buquet signals a Lyon throw-in in Strasbourg's half.
Free kick Lyon.
Ruddy Buquet signals a throw-in for Strasbourg, close to Lyon's area.
At Stade de la Meinau the fourth official shows that 4 minutes will be added to the 2nd half.
Ruddy Buquet signals a Strasbourg throw-in in Lyon's half.
Lyon awarded a free kick in their own half.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Throw-in for Lyon in their own half.
Can Lyon get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Strasbourg's half?
The whistle has gone to end the second half. The match finishes 2-3.
Jean-Eudes Aholou (Strasbourg) has received a yellow card from Ruddy Buquet.
